title: How to Get Past Sierra 117 on Halo 3 Legendary

steps.headline: Go slowly.
steps.description: Crouch. Follow the soldiers to the waterfall.

steps.headline: Take your Magnum out.
steps.description: Jump onto the log and wait in the bushes. Once the brute is done talking, snipe him. May take 3 clips.

steps.headline: Take on the Grunts.
steps.description: They are easier, but on Legendary, can still kill you. The Phantom will drop off more, just frag them.

steps.headline: Follow the path.
steps.description: Continue to snipe until you run out of ammo. Save your Assault Rifle. Pick up a Needler. Spray and pray.

steps.headline: Once you find the captive soldier (after Johnson's crew was split up), you may choose whether or not to save him.
steps.description: If you do, crouch, and walk over under the log. Go over to the other side and shoot the Brute. Leave the Grunts to be dealt with.

steps.headline: You will come into 3 firefights.
steps.description: Skirt around and pick them off. Once you come to the crashed Pelican (after you see Johnson's crew retreating) get the sniper rifle. No buts.

steps.headline: Take them on.
steps.description: Use Portable Covers if you come across some. Once you come to the ridge, snipe the Brute carrying a Gravity Hammer. Stay if you like, and continue sniping.

steps.headline: Jump down.
steps.description: Bring out your Assault Rifle. Throw grenades. Be sure to hide whenever your shields reach 50% or below. Once cleared, rescue Johnson. (Note, whenever you play on Easy, only Johnson will survive.) Hold out.

steps.headline: Pick off more Covenant one-by-one.
steps.description: Eventually, a Pelican will come and save you. Congrats. You just beat Sierra-117 on Legendary.

text: Go slowly. Crouch. Follow the soldiers to the waterfall. Take your Magnum out. Jump onto the log and wait in the bushes. Once the brute is done talking, snipe him. May take 3 clips. Take on the Grunts. They are easier, but on Legendary, can still kill you. The Phantom will drop off more, just frag them. Follow the path. Continue to snipe until you run out of ammo. Save your Assault Rifle. Pick up a Needler. Spray and pray. Once you find the captive soldier (after Johnson's crew was split up), you may choose whether or not to save him. If you do, crouch, and walk over under the log. Go over to the other side and shoot the Brute. Leave the Grunts to be dealt with. You will come into 3 firefights. Skirt around and pick them off. Once you come to the crashed Pelican (after you see Johnson's crew retreating) get the sniper rifle. No buts. Take them on. Use Portable Covers if you come across some. Once you come to the ridge, snipe the Brute carrying a Gravity Hammer. Stay if you like, and continue sniping. Jump down. Bring out your Assault Rifle. Throw grenades. Be sure to hide whenever your shields reach 50% or below. Once cleared, rescue Johnson. (Note, whenever you play on Easy, only Johnson will survive.) Hold out. Pick off more Covenant one-by-one. Eventually, a Pelican will come and save you. Congrats. You just beat Sierra-117 on Legendary.
